column2:
"That thing's big! Really, really big! What do they call it, Big Vardha?
That is one huge Mech!"
"How could they expect an ARKS to go up against something like that? It's totally unfair, if you ask me!"
"Fighting one of those things would be suicide. I mean, they're so powerful, and they're solid as a rock. I bet even you couldn't handle it, killer."
"...But I know whatever I say won't stop you. I've come to understand that about ya."
"All I can really do is cheer you on from here, so go give 'em hell. I can't wait to hear your report!"
